entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
